alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Cherokee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 11:49PM CDT until August 11 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cherokee County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern Buena Vista County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1149 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Larrabee, or near Cherokee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Alta, Aurelia, Cleghorn, Linn Grove, Larrabee, and Meriden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
